title: Path Less Traveled Blog
description:
A blog created through Express and MongoDB (including Mongoose) in order to save the blog posts to a database. Additionally, the library EJS was used along with other dependencies like basic middleware. 

Currently working on a re-design.

title: Number Converter
description:
A basic number converter displaying conversions for length and for weight utilizing objects in Javascript.
 Used the smallest conversion number to create the proper conversions.

title: Calculator
description: A basic calculator as my first ever project in JavaScript.
